author: vors
body:
@andschwa this PR is more FYI then a real intention to merge.
I did some gorilla-style fixes in project.json and they are not ready yet.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This is amazing. Also I _think_ I've found enough docs to enable this on a configuration basis, I will give it a whack!

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Cancel PR to avoid running too many CI builds
